synopsis: A skilled thief, who commits corporate espionage by infiltrating the subconscious of his targets, is offered a chance to have his criminal record erased if he can successfully perform an inception on a target's mind.
Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to create chaos in Gotham City, and must confront his own moral dilemmas in order to protect the city and its citizens.
The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
A group of explorers venture into space to travel through a wormhole in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival, as Earth faces impending extinction due to environmental disasters.
